location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Persian Gulf Gazetteer, Part II: Geographical and descriptive materials, Section III: Central Arabia.'

mods.abstract: The volume, marked confidential, is Persian Gulf Gazetteer, Part II: Geographical and descriptive materials, Section III: Central Arabia, compiled by John Gordon Lorimer, and includes the printing statement 'G. C. Press Simla - No. C-905 F. D. - 18.11.04 - 80 - C. G.'. The volume begins with notes from the author, dated 14 November 1904, and is then divided into two subsections, as follows:A - Central Arabia, South of Wadi RummahB - Central Arabia, North of Wadi RummahEach subsection, organised alphabetically by name, contains a variety of geographic information, including towns and villages, districts, physical geography, tribes and tribal sub-sections, wells, and forts.
